# Steve Platt

Steve was elected to the Bend City Council in 2024.

* * *

**Council Position:**  
4th

**Term Ends:**  
2028

## Contact

- [Steve Platt](https://www.bendoregon.gov/Home/Components/StaffDirectory/StaffDirectory/609/36?backlist=%2Fgovernment%2Fcity-council%2Fsteve-platt)
  
  City Councilor
  
  - 541-749-7322
  - [splatt@bendoregon.gov](https:void%280%29; "Click to send message to this staff member")

![Steve is of fair complexion with short brownish gray hair.](https://www.bendoregon.gov/home/showpublishedimage/17562/638720956523100000)My public service as both a military officer and educator shapes my vision for a thriving Bend, in both the near term and in building a resilient future for Central Oregon. I am dedicated to serving as a voice for all of Bend as we move forward together. You will find me with my family on the trails, around the lakes and on the rivers of our beautiful community enjoying all that Central Oregon has to offer.

## Education

- **UC Davis**, Science Teaching Credential
- **Eisenhower School for National Security and Resource Strategy**, M.S.
- **Air Force Institute of Technology**, M.S.
- **US Air Force Academy**, B.S.

## Professional and Volunteer Experience

- **Physics teacher**, Bend La Pine Schools
- **Retired Air Force fighter pilot**
- **Budget Committee**, City of Bend 2023-2024

## 2025-2027 Council Liaison Assignments

- [**Stewardship Subcommittee**](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/city-council/council-subcommittees/stewardship)
- [**Audit Subcommittee**](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/city-council/council-subcommittees/audit-subcommittee)
- [**Affordable Housing Advisory Committee (AHAC)**](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/committees/affordable-housing-advisory-committee)
- [**Environment &amp; Climate Committee (ECC) - Alternate**](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/committees/environment-climate-committee)
- [**Landmarks Commission**](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/committees/landmarks-commission)
- [**Planning Commission**](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/committees/planning-commission)
- [**Awbrey Butte Neighborhood District**](https://www.bendoregon.gov/government/departments/communications-engagement/neighborhood-districts)
- ## Summit West Neighborhood District
